name: vega-parser
description: Parse Vega specifications to runtime dataflows.

scripts.build: npm run test && uglifyjs build/vega-parser.js -c -m -o build/vega-parser.min.js
scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && json2module package.json > build/package.js && rollup -f umd -n vega -o build/vega-parser.js -- index.js
